name: Cyber Warrior beta 0.0.2
description:
New in beta 0.0.2

- Basic enemies now drop health instead of overpowerd weapons

-Added New area (The Maze)

-Huge bossfight in basement for the Ultramate Gunnnn

-New enemies and bigger map

-New gun  (The minigun)

Bug fixes

-added coliders to most props so no more going through them

-Removed bots from bossfight to stop glitching
